articles.content: AUSTIN (KXAN) Downtown Austin is getting a new park this summer. Waterloo Park, an 11-acre urban park that will feature hike-and-bike trails, playscapes and the Moody Amphitheater, is set to open in … [+872 chars]

articles.description: With COVID-19 abating in California, Disneyland reopened on April 30. After 13 months away, how did it feel?
